parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True sets the end condition in the forward direction, false sets it in the reverse direction

parameters.name: EndCondition
parameters.description: End condition as defined in swEndConditions_e

title: ISurfExtrudeFeatureData.SetEndCondition
description: Sets the end condition of this extruded surface in the forward or reverse direction.
signature:
void SetEndCondition( 
   System.Boolean
Forward
,
   System.Int32
EndCondition
)

parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True sets the end condition in the forward direction, false sets it in the reverse direction

parameters.name: EndCondition
parameters.description: End condition as defined in swEndConditions_e

remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
